# 3.6.2 Simple Linear Regression

```{r}
library(ISLR2)
library(tidymodels)
```

```{r}
lm_mod <-
  linear_reg() %>%
  set_engine("lm")
lm_fit <-
  lm_mod %>%
  fit(medv ~ lstat, data = Boston)

lm_fit
tidy(lm_fit)
```

```{r}
conf_int_new <- predict(lm_fit, new_data = tibble(lstat = c(5, 10, 15)), type = "conf_int")
conf_int_new
pred_int_new <- predict(lm_fit, new_data = tibble(lstat = c(5, 10, 15)), type = "pred_int")
pred_int_new
```
